title: Bride and Prejudice's Lody says Jess turned her daughter gay
text:
Lesbian couple Jess and Jojo have been fighting for the approval of Jojo's Lebanese Catholic parents, Sid and Lody, on this season of Bride and Prejudice.

And on Wednesday's episode, tensions came to a head as Jess confronted Jojo's parents inside a Catholic church.

Jess, 28, begged the couple to attend their same-sex wedding and asked Sid to walk his daughter Jojo down the aisle.

Holy: On Wednesday's episode of Bride and Prejudice, tensions came to a head as Jess confronted Jojo's parents Sid and Lody inside a Catholic church

They went back and forth until things became increasingly heated, leading Lody to make a shocking accusation.

'God gave you this child and you're not even accepting her because she's gay?' Jess cried.

'She wasn't gay before she met you!' Lody barked back. 'She was not gay, no she wasn't.'

'God gave you this child and you're not even accepting her because she's gay?' Jess cried

'She was before she met me,' Jess argued back. 'And the reason why you don't know is because she can't even tell you, she can't even have a conversation with you.'

Jess also revealed that Jojo had been 'crying herself to sleep at night' because her parents wouldn't support her wedding.

'Wouldn't your dream just be for your child to be happy?' Jess asked with tears streaming down her face.

'She wasn't gay before she met you!' Lody barked back. 'She was not gay, no she wasn't!'

'Maybe we are a bit old-fashioned darling, me and my husband,' Lody finally admitted.

'I don't want her to cry herself to sleep... We still love you and we love her.'

Despite making some headway, Sid still refused to attend the wedding, while Lody said that she had to 'respect' her husband and support his decision.

'I can't do what Joanne wants,' Sid said. 'I'm sorry, I don't want you to be upset, but I'd be ashamed of myself.'
